sources.name: ‘Clio Infra’ Project
sources.description:
Data provider‘Clio Infra’ Project
Original sourceVarious sources are used (well documented online at Clio Infra). The main source is: Aboubarb, M.R. and A.L.. Kimball. “A New Dataset on Infant Mortality Rates, 1816-2002.” Journal of Peace Research 44 (2007):743. This dataset is available for download at prio here (it is called: M. Rodwan Abouharb & Anessa L. Kimball – A New Dataset on Infant Mortality Rates, 1816-2002).Clio Infra’ Project
Linkhttp://www.clio-infra.eu/datasets/indicators
Retrieved18/02/2016

variables.name: Infant mortality under 1 year of age (Clio Infra)
